situation.meta_description: Many people are unable to repay their loans or mortgages due to a loss of income due to the COVID-19 pandemic.

situation.title: Working with a client
situation.meta_description: The provision of services in establishments is currently prohibited. Although, individual work for the client is allowed, due to the seriousness of the current epidemiological situation, we do not recommend working with clients.

situation.title: Home office - bussiness
situation.meta_description: The government calls upon all employers for whom the nature of their work and the operating conditions allow to agree with their employees to work from home (home office).

situation.title: Agriculture
situation.meta_description: Agricultural industries are not subject to restrictions on trade and services. It is therefore possible to carry out agricultural work, but the situation at the workplace must be adapted to hygienic rules.

situation.title: Hygiene products at the workplace
situation.meta_description: The workplace is one of the most common places of infection, because there is a large number of people from different environments for a long period of time, and therefore it is necessary to follow increased hygiene measures.

situation.meta_description: When dealing with the authorities during the COVID-19 pandemic, priorotize electronic and telephone communication over a personal visit.
